LIDEX scrap shears with side compression are particularly suitable for cutting and compacting heavy and bulky scrap metal. These machines are ideal to reach very high production levels up to 115 t/h with low operating costs. 

The LIDEX is the only scrap shear with side compression to offer a complete automatic cycle that includes discharging of scrap materials from the preload table into the compression box, closing of the box and complete cutting cycle.

The LIDEX allows productivity gains of 25%

LIDEX scrap shear with side compression is particularly suitable for cutting and compacting heavy and bulky scrap metal thanks to the its throat size, its power and side-squeeze force.

These machines are ideal to reach very high production levels up to 115 t/h with low operating costs. They also can be used for baling and can have a pusher with a press force of either 250 tons or 320 tons for an increased densification of the material.

Till now, the LIDEX is the only scrap shear with side compression to offer a complete automatic cycle that includes discharging of scrap materials from the preload table into the compression box, closing of the box and complete cutting cycle.

This unique function is made possible mainly by two major innovations:

innovative kinematics for the preload table which allows dumping of scrap metal directly into the pusher area, and thus reducing the number of movements

a high amplitude lid designed to exert exceptional compaction power and efficiency to reduce cycle times.

The operator who is no longer needed for compression and shearing operations frees up time for carrying out other operations.

The LIDEX allows productivity gains of 25%

Maximum efficiency, innovative technology and precise material separation

The ArnoShred V sets new standards in shredding technology. Thanks to its unique polyhedron design, it makes optimum use of centrifugal force and ensures highly efficient processing.  

Automatic Material Separation ‚Äì Save Time, Increase Efficiency
A standout feature of the ArnoShred V is its ability to automatically separate materials with different specific masses ‚Äì such as plastic and aluminum or copper and iron. This saves valuable time and significantly simplifies downstream sorting processes.

Flexible Adaptation to Individual Requirements
With variable rotor speeds ranging from 600 to 1,200 RPM and a broad drive power spectrum from 2√ó22 kW to 2√ó315 kW, the ArnoShred V adapts flexibly to a wide range of applications. Available in different model sizes ‚Äì from 2,900 √ó 1,800 √ó 1,800 mm to larger variants ‚Äì it can be seamlessly integrated into existing plant concepts.

Maximum Flexibility in the Shredding Process
The ArnoShred V operates in both continuous and batch modes. The particle size of the output material can be individually adjusted to achieve optimal results for various applications. Using state-of-the-art technology, it shreds and fragments a broad range of materials ‚Äì making it the perfect solution for different industries and applications.

Easy Maintenance ‚Äì Reduced Operating Costs
The innovative wear-part concept enables customers to perform maintenance and servicing independently ‚Äì without the need for external specialists. The use of cost-effective, readily available spare parts reduces operating costs and ensures long-term economic efficiency.

Test the ArnoShred V in Our Test Center!
See the power of the ArnoShred V for yourself ‚Äì test your own materials directly in our test center! We also offer additional processes such as sorting, separation, screening, and grinding. Within a short time, you‚Äôll receive precise results tailored to your specific requirements.

Secure the Future of Shredding Technology!
Contact us for personalized consultation or schedule a test appointment today.

Contact us for personalized consultation or schedule a test appointment today.

Storm damage along a railway line requires professional tree-felling work on steep slopes. For this, the company Braun relies on the SENNEBOGEN 728 E tree handler, whose 21-meter reach and flexibility enable safe removal of problem vegetation along the route. Equipped with robust attachments like a tree shear and grapple saw, the work is carried out efficiently. Success in this project led to a rent-to-own agreement and additional projects, including along the highway from the Weinsberg interchange to the Bavarian border.

The bearing clearance monitoring system by Liebherr is a digital condition monitoring for slewing bearings, which is ideal for use in various applications, from mining and material handling up to maritime equipment. The BCM can be used to measure bearing wear in axial and radial directions, as well as tilting clearance. Such a digital system does not only ensure flexibility in measurement, but also reduced downtime, lower costs in maintenance and, above all, increased protection of personnel. 

The focus of digital clearance maintenance lies on personnel safety. Since the measuring devices are already permanently installed on the bearing, service technicians will not have to mount dial gauges or other measuring devices directly onto the slewing bearing in dangerous areas under the excavator or other machines. An additional advantage is the fact that measurements can be carried out at any time autonomously, without the help of external service providers.

Smart, integrated and remote, the bearing clearance monitoring is a small helper with great effects.


Further information: 
https://www.liebherr.com/en-de/components/innovations/digitisation/smart-bearing-condition-monitoring-4689614

Discover Liebherr Mining's Autonomous Haulage Solution (AHS), co-developed with Fortescue. The AHS, part of Liebherr's IoMine integrated operations technology portfolio, is transforming mining operations by combining advanced automation with real-time data insights to enhance productivity, safety and efficiency. This innovative ecosystem includes an integrated Fleet Management System (FMS) and Machine Guidance System (MGS). The Fleet Management System (FMS) integrates mining operations to boost productivity, optimise haulage assignments and maximise fleet utilisation ‚Äì all of which helps to reduce non-productive time across the entire load-haul-dump value chain. The MGS delivers critical material information to minimise ore variability and dilution, improving overall performance.

Sin embargo, la nueva gr√∫a de 700 toneladas no est√° ni mucho menos al l√≠mite de su rendimiento, ya que est√° dise√±ada para el montaje de modernos aerogeneradores con alturas de buje de hasta 170 metros. ‚ÄãDer neue Schmalspur Raupenkran LR 1700-1.0W des spanischen Kunden Aguado kann seine Leistungsf√§higkeit bereits bei seinem ersten Einsatz unter Beweis stellen: Bei der Montage von acht Windkraftanlagen im Windpark Cascante in Navarra mit Nabenh√∂hen von 119 Metern. ‚ÄãThe new LR 1700-1.0W narrow-track crawler crane from Spanish customer Aguado is already proving its capabilities on its first job: during the assembly of eight wind turbines at the Cascante wind farm in Navarra with hub heights of 119 meters. However, the new 700-tonn-crane is nowhere near its performance limit, as it is designed for the assembly of modern wind turbines with hub heights of up to 170 meters. It offers significantly higher load capacities and hub heights than its predecessor, the LR 1600/2-W. The basis for this is a more powerful basic machine as well as the 3.5-meter-wide H-lattice type sections in the lower area of the main boom, which increase the lateral stability of the entire system. Liebherr also offers the LR 1700-1.0W with a luffing jib. This option was not available for its predecessor.

The Liebherr 33 L fast-erecting crane from Edificam has already completed its first job: the construction of a house of approx. 300 m2 in Calvia, Palma de Mallorca.

Cranes in the L series can be made ready for use quickly. Their compact design makes them ideal for sites with constricted space.

The 25 L and 33 L are the new L cranes. In addition to ease of assembly and flexibility, the L series also features Liebherr's latest in-house control generation. With the Tower Crane OS 2, you are at the cutting edge of technology. This control system already fulfils the requirements of tomorrow. It also brings innovation and safety to your construction site.
